程序包 hdb.data.relational

类 RelationSchema

java.lang.Object
hdb.data.relational.RelationSchema
所有已实现的接口:
java.io.Serializable
public class RelationSchema
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
A RelationSchema represents the schema of a relation.
作者:
Jeong-Hyon Hwang (jhh@cs.albany.edu)
另请参阅:
序列化表格

  • 嵌套类概要

    嵌套类 
    修饰符和类型 类 说明
    static class  RelationSchema.InvalidAttributeIndexException
    An InvalidAttributeIndexException is thrown if an invalid attribute index is given to a RelationSchema.
    static class  RelationSchema.InvalidRelationSchemaDefinitionException
    An InvalidRelationSchemaDefinition is thrown if a RelationSchema is defined inappropriately.

  • 构造器概要

    构造器 
    构造器 说明
    RelationSchema​(java.lang.String[] attributeNames, java.lang.Class<?>[] attributeTypes)
    Constructs a RelationSchema.

  • 方法概要

    修饰符和类型 方法 说明
    java.lang.Integer attributeIndex​(java.lang.String attributeName)
    Returns the index of the specified attribute in this RelationSchema (null if no such attribute).
    java.lang.String attributeName​(int attributeIndex)
    Returns the name of the specified attribute.
    java.lang.Class<?> attributeType​(int attributeIndex)
    Returns the type of the specified attribute.
    static RelationSchema createRelationSchema​(java.lang.String fileName)
    Creates a RelationSchema from the specified file.
    void save​(java.lang.String fileName)
    Saves this RelationSchema in the specified file.
    int size()
    Returns the number of attributes in this RelationSchema.
    java.lang.String toString()
    Returns a string representation of this RelationSchema.

    从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

    equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

  • 构造器详细资料

    • RelationSchema

      public RelationSchema​(java.lang.String[] attributeNames, java.lang.Class<?>[] attributeTypes) throws RelationSchema.InvalidRelationSchemaDefinitionException
      Constructs a RelationSchema.
      参数:
      attributeNames - the names of the attributes of the RelationSchema
      attributeTypes - the types of the attributes of the RelationSchema
      抛出:
      RelationSchema.InvalidRelationSchemaDefinitionException - if the number of attribute names and the number of attribute types do not match

  • 方法详细资料

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString()
      Returns a string representation of this RelationSchema.
      覆盖:
      toString 在类中 java.lang.Object

    • size

      public int size()
      Returns the number of attributes in this RelationSchema.
      返回:
      the number of attributes in this RelationSchema

    • attributeName

      public java.lang.String attributeName​(int attributeIndex) throws RelationSchema.InvalidAttributeIndexException
      Returns the name of the specified attribute.
      参数:
      attributeIndex - the index of an attribute
      返回:
      the name of the specified attribute
      抛出:
      RelationSchema.InvalidAttributeIndexException - if an invalid attribute index is given to this RelationSchema

    • attributeType

      public java.lang.Class<?> attributeType​(int attributeIndex) throws RelationSchema.InvalidAttributeIndexException
      Returns the type of the specified attribute.
      参数:
      attributeIndex - the index of the attribute
      返回:
      the type of the specified attribute
      抛出:
      RelationSchema.InvalidAttributeIndexException - if an invalid attribute index is given to this RelationSchema

    • attributeIndex

      public java.lang.Integer attributeIndex​(java.lang.String attributeName)
      Returns the index of the specified attribute in this RelationSchema (null if no such attribute).
      参数:
      attributeName - the name of the attribute
      返回:
      the index of the specified attribute in this RelationSchema; null if no such attribute

    • save

      public void save​(java.lang.String fileName) throws java.io.FileNotFoundException, java.io.IOException
      Saves this RelationSchema in the specified file.
      参数:
      fileName - the name of the file to store this RelationSchema
      抛出:
      java.io.FileNotFoundException - if the file cannot be opened
      java.io.IOException - if an IO error occurs

    • createRelationSchema

      public static RelationSchema createRelationSchema​(java.lang.String fileName) throws java.io.FileNotFoundException, java.io.IOException, java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
      Creates a RelationSchema from the specified file.
      参数:
      fileName - the name of the file from which a RelationSchema is created
      返回:
      a RelationSchema created from the specified file
      抛出:
      java.io.FileNotFoundException - if the specified file cannot be found
      java.io.IOException - if an IO error occurs
      java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - if the class of a serialized object cannot be found
